0: Shares of Weight Watchers International (WTW) jumped as much as 20 percent after Oprah Winfrey said she shed 26 pounds using the program, while eating bread every day. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR In a video posted to Twitter, Winfrey, an investor and spokesperson for the company, declared her fondness for bread, saying she consumed it each day while losing weight. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Shares rose as high as $13.54 after the release of the video, following a pattern that also had shares of Weight Watchers rising after the media mogul said on "The Ellen DeGeneres Show" that he had lost 15 pounds.
